Eleanor Freya Shepherd

Technology and Applied Studies Teacher

Contrary to popular belief, I'm a person.

-- My Passion --

Through my formative years, I fell in love with education and more specifically, the TAS curriculum, allowing students to bolster their confidence in their physical skills as well as the chance for pure creativity to flourish in a non-artistic medium. As such, I strive to empower students with the skills they require to create solutions to any problems that may stand in their way, both educationally and in the wider world.

I truly enjoy working with students and other teachers to develop lessons that are readily enjoyed and appropriate for the curriculum outlines as set out by NESA.

Teaching Philosophy
